sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Fire Hydrant Act.

sections.heading: Any fire hydrant installed or replaced after the effective
sections.text:
date of this Act shall have a discharge that is
maintained at least 14 inches, but not more than 26 inches, from the
surface from which the hydrant protrudes. No object shall be constructed,
maintained or installed within 48 inches of a fire hydrant. It shall be
unlawful to install, maintain, construct or enlarge any barriers, trees,
bushes, walls, or other obstacles which may hide or impede the use of a fire hydrant.
